SANDRA (Switching & Routing Agent)

Every assets included in this page is a marketing kit for SANDRA (Switching & Routing Agent).

Products Name

It has to be written as SANDRA, all caps, or SANDRA (Switching & Routing Agent). It also recommended to use additional information after it, such as "by DAKSA" or "product of DAKSA".

Concept & Sketches

This is the product icon's transformation for SANDRA. From early sketches to final form.

The final sketch and final form.

These are several variation of sizes can be directly used on web page.

Our Design Team has provided an alternative version of SANDRA product icon and the icon-only version.

Download SANDRA Marketing Kit

This marketing kit includes product icon in high-res, smaller sizes, alternative version, and icons.

SANDRA Marketing Kit(365 KB)
